verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H561>sayings,<s%> And <S%H6845>treasure<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H854>within<s%> you,
<S%H7181>Make<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H7181>attentive<s%> to <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H5186>Incline<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8394>understanding;<s%>
For <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H7121>cry<s%> for <S%H998>discernment,<s%> <S%H5414>Lift<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> for <S%H8394>understanding;<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H1245>seek<s%> her as <S%H3701>silver,<s%> And <S%H2664>search<s%> for her as for <S%H4301>hidden<s%> <S%H4301>treasures;<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> you will <S%H995>discern<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H4672>discover<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> From His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> [come] <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
He <S%H6845>stores<s%> up <S%H8454>sound<s%> <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright;<s%> [He is] a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to those who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H8537>integrity,<s%>
<S%H5341>Guarding<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H4941>justice,<s%> And He <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of His <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> you will <S%H995>discern<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%> And <S%H4339>equity<s%> [and] <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4570>course.<s%>
For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> And <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> will be <S%H5276>pleasant<s%> to your <S%H5315>soul;<s%>
<S%H4209>Discretion<s%> will <S%H8104>guard<s%> you, <S%H8394>Understanding<s%> will <S%H5341>watch<s%> over you,
To <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H9563>evil,<s%> From the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H8419>things;<s%>
From those who <S%H5800>leave<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H3476>uprightness,<s%> To <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness;<s%>
<S%H8056>Who<s%> <S%H8056>delight<s%> in <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H9563>evil,<s%> And <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H8419>perversity<s%> of <S%H9563>evil;<s%>
<S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H734>paths<s%> are <S%H6141>crooked,<s%> And who are <S%H3868>devious<s%> in their <S%H4570>ways;<s%>
To <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you from the <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> From the <S%H5237>adulteress<s%> who <S%H9140>flatters<s%> with her <S%H561>words;<s%>
That <S%H5800>leaves<s%> the <S%H9017>companion<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> And <S%H7911>forgets<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of her <S%H430>God;<s%>
For her <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7743>sinks<s%> <S%H7743>down<s%> to <S%H4194>death,<s%> And her <S%H4570>tracks<s%> [lead] to the <S%H7496>dead;<s%>
<S%H3605>None<s%> <S%H3808><s%> who <S%H935>go<s%> to her <S%H7725>return<s%> again, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> do they <S%H5381>reach<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H9132>life.<s%>
<S%H4616>So<s%> you will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2896>men,<s%> And <S%H8104>keep<s%> to the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
For the <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H7931>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> And the <S%H8549>blameless<s%> will <S%H3498>remain<s%> in it;
But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H776>land,<s%> And the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> will be <S%H5255>uprooted<s%> from it.
